name: Starshine Starbright
description:
🌠✨⭐ there is a world to take over.  🌟✨🌠

🌟 Query : How to play ⭐

- Move the black hole to let it fall prey onto all those cute little stars

- Find the right spot to bounce around the platforms and eat collect as many stars as possible

- Make it to the sun to take over the solar system :)

Funny little game I made in university. 

If anyone can get all stars, you get a cookie :) 🍪⭐✨💫

Note: Apparently if your computer doesn't have the right font, it'll fuck them up. Thanks Construct :T
